segments.text: Susan has been down recently . I saw her this morning , she looked terrible !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She broke up with her boyfriend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard her boyfriend is married .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She still loves him . That's why she feels upset . Her love is always hard and confusing ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then what about you ? How are you getting on with your boyfriend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He sometimes really drives me crazy .
segments.speaker: S1
